hero.title: Win More Tenders,
hero.description: PLANIFI streamlines your entire tender process from discovery to submission with our all-in-one platform built for serious businesses.

features.title: Comprehensive Tender Management
features.description: PLANIFI combines all the tools you need to win more tenders in one powerful, easy-to-use platform.

items.title: User Management
items.description: Secure authentication with role-based access control for seamless team collaboration on tenders.
items.benefit: Keep your sensitive tender documents secure while enabling team collaboration.

items.title: Project Management
items.description: Customize your projects with unique views: Kanban, Gantt, and List views.
items.benefit: Never miss a tender deadline with visual progress tracking.

items.title: Document Repository
items.description: Intelligent document management with version control and template library.
items.benefit: Find the right documents instantly and maintain perfect version history.

items.title: Organization Management
items.description: Manage your team's resumes, skills, and company structure for faster tender responses.
items.benefit: Reduce response time by 40% with ready-to-use company information.

items.title: Tender Management
items.description: Discover, track, and respond to tender opportunities all in one place.
items.benefit: Never miss a relevant tender opportunity with smart alerts.

items.title: Built-in Tools
items.description: Essential tools including resume builder, currency converter, and compliance checkers.
items.benefit: Save time with specialized tools designed for tender success.
